conversation.content: At 5am I was on 50th Street. What direction did I go to get here?

conversation.chosen: To get to our current location on 3rd Avenue, you went west. This is because 50th Street east of Central Pointe, the center of the city.
conversation.rejected:
To determine the direction you traveled from 50th street at 5 am, we need to compare it to another address. Let's compare it to 49th street.
If 50th street has a lower number than 49th street, then you have traveled east because the numbers increase as you move away from central point towards the east. In this case, since 50th street has a higher number than 49th street, it means you have moved west. This means that 50th street is to the west of 49th street.
Therefore, when moving from 49th street to 50th street, you will be heading west. Conversely, if you were starting at 50th street and headed towards 49th street, you would be going east.
